intro: Linociera zeylanica, commonly known as the Ceylon linociera, is a tropical plant native to Sri Lanka and parts of southern India. It is a climbing shrub belonging to the Rubiaceae family, characterized by its woody stems and opposite leaves. The plant produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are often clustered in inflorescences.
